about_the_game:
In the year 2XXX AD, nanomachines have turned humanity into perfect physical beings—strong, agile, and tireless. But with this perfection came control. Governments and megacorporations have shackled human desires, suppressing emotions and turning people into obedient, soulless soldiers.

But now, Libido, a rogue faction, is unleashing chaos. They’ve reprogrammed nanomachines to awaken raw, primal urges, driving the city into a frenzy of unrestrained lust. As Special Agent Siena, you’ve been sent to infiltrate this world of erotic rebellion and take down the rising threat.

The only way to bring these superhuman enemies down? Push their desires to the limit. Build tension in fast-paced combat, tease them to the edge, then make them cum to drain their strength and leave them helpless. In a world where pleasure is the ultimate weapon, you’ll need to master both combat and seduction to succeed.

Key Features:

  • Play as Special Agent Seina, tasked by the government to end the crime syndicate LIBIDO by any means necessary.

  • Battle waves of enemies on the streets of Virtue City in this side scrolling beat em up adventure.

  • Your enemies don't fear pain, but you can FINISH THEM off with a variety of sexy finishers to neutralize the threat.

  • Unleash devastating combos using multiple combat stances such: Stroke of the Fist, Step of the Feet, Crushing Bottom and Dance of Fans.

  • Inspired by 90s classics like Mortal Kombat and Killer Instinct...now with sexy finishing moves!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult content including full nudity and sexual scenes.

name: LUST RUSH
short_description: Play as Special Agent Seina, and take down the crime syndicate LIBIDO in this side scrolling beat em up! Bring your enemies to their knees, one orgasm at a time. FINISH THEM!
